channel.title: NPC Drops
channel.description: whoever is doing XML stuff (not me) will need to grab the original RSCA release and take the drop XML's from them, as the current version we have i believe was from TheLastStand and has been reported that dark wizards, men, guards etc don't have drops, this was never the case in RSCA.

item.title: NPC Drops
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:

I was just bitching about men dropping 20-22 coins… wut happened

whoever is doing XML stuff (not me) will need to grab the original RSCA release and take the drop XML’s from them, as the current version we have i believe was from TheLastStand and has been reported that dark wizards, men, guards etc don’t have drops, this was never the case in RSCA.
